驼峰命名法转换工具 CamelCaseUtils.toCamelCase("orderId") == "orderId" CamelCaseUtils.toCamelCase("hello_world") == "helloWorld" CamelCaseUtils.toCapitalizeCamelCase("hello_world") == "HelloWorld" CamelCaseUtils.toUnderScoreCase("helloWorld") = "hello_world"
